show_name: Chōjū Kishin Dancougar: Hakunetsu no Shūshō (OAV)
other_title: Super Bestial Machine God Dancougar: Blazing Epilogue
超獣機神ダンクーガ 白熱の終章 (Japanese)
plot: After many battles the members of the Jūsenki-tai have gone their separate ways. But one person will bring them all together again: Shapiro Keats. The man who sided with Muge Zarbados in the beginning is still alive. One friend-turned-foe awaits the Jūsenki-tai once again, in what will be their final battle.
ending_theme: "Tamerenai ni Period" (ためらいにピリオド) by Yuriko Yamamoto (eps 1-3)
"Burning Love" (バーニング・ラヴ) by Jūsenki-tai (ep 4)
